Legal_Issue: Distinctiveness of the trademark LOCAL in relation to existing marks LOCAL 510 and LOCAL 522
Procedural_Stage: Appeal from Trade-Marks Opposition Board decision to the Court
Evidence_Assessment: Applicant's evidence was limited and unreliable; failed to establish significant reputation of LOCAL 510/522 in Calgary by September 21, 2009
Burden_of_Proof: On the opponent (CEG License Inc.) to prove lack of distinctiveness due to reputation
Credibility_Factor: Evidence provided by applicant deemed insufficient and not credible enough to support claim of prior reputation
Legal_Rule: A trademark must be distinctive under the Trade-marks Act
Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness or correctness in appellate review of administrative decisions
Procedural_Issue: Introduction of new evidence on appeal
Grounds_for_Claim: Opponent claimed LOCAL was not distinctive due to similarity with and prior use of LOCAL 510 and LOCAL 522
Outcome_on_Merits: Appeal dismissed; trademark LOCAL upheld as distinctive
Decision_Maker: Court reviewing appeal from Trade-Marks Opposition Board
Review_Standard: Assessment based on sufficiency and reliability of evidence presented
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Process followed proper opposition and appeal procedures
Key_Evidence_Considered: Evidence regarding public recognition and usage of LOCAL 510 and LOCAL 522 in Calgary prior to September 21, 2009
Legal_Framework: Canadian Trade-marks Act framework for assessing distinctiveness
Applicant_Challenge: Joey Tomato's (Canada) Inc. challenged opposition to registration of LOCAL
Court_Result: Dismissed appeal; confirmed distinctiveness of LOCAL
Defendant_Response: CEG License Inc. opposed registration on grounds of non-distinctiveness
Decision_Authority: Federal Court or relevant appellate court
Remedy_Sought: Confirmation of distinctiveness and approval of trademark registration
Resolution_Mechanism: Judicial review of administrative opposition board decision
Legal_Provision: Sections 38(2)(d) and 2 of the Trade-marks Act
Authority: Trade-Marks Opposition Board, subsequently reviewed by the Court
Claimant_Status: CEG License Inc. as opponent; Joey Tomato's (Canada) Inc. as applicant
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Lack of distinctiveness due to similarity with prior marks
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Application for registration of LOCAL trademark
Governing_Rule: Distinctiveness requirement under the Trade-marks Act
